text: Alfta GIF is a sports club in Alfta in Sweden. It was established on 10 November 1900. The club runs handball, ice hockey and soccer. Earlier the club also ran bandy. The men's bandy team played in the Swedish top division in 1941. The men's soccer team has played in the Swedish third division. The ice hockey section was established in 1947. The skiing and track and field athletics sections have been inactive since 2002. == References == ==Other websites== *Handball *Ice hockey *Soccer Category:1900 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Handball clubs in Sweden Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs Category:Athletics clubs in Sweden Category:Ski clubs in Sweden
title: Alfta GIF
